name: Odo Studios
blurb: Hi, I'm odo. i'm a BL webcomic artist and digital illustrator! I also stream on Twitch to build confidence to chat, and to show my process for my art!

name: Mango Mousse
blurb: I started as a graphic designer that wanted to bring ideas to life. I like to create enamel pins, stickers, and charms inspired by cats and other cute things.

name: Nekomata Co.
blurb: My sister and I work together in sync to bring you enamel pins, prints, stickers and whatever else we think our customers might enjoy!

name: Florakitz
blurb: Hey I'm Flora, a german freelance artist and tattoo artist. I get inspiration from Alphonse Mucha and nature itself. I love sitting in the sun and just enjoying the moment. Appreciating plants and animals by creating art is pure fulfillment for me.

name: Maotsuno
blurb: Henlo! I’m Mao, a disabled, autistic and queer artist from Germany who specializes in anime art! I mostly draw original characters, which all have their own lore and background — a lot of them are fandom characters with a wide array of alternate universe versions (because you can’t ever have enough.) I love to design outfits for my OCs and also dabble in some fanfiction and roleplay writing. Aside from that I craft a bit here and there, for either cosplay or LARP. I don’t nearly draw as much as I would like to, but it’s always the most fun to share my characters’ stories with other people!
